title: 520. The Unintended Consequences of Working from Home
description: The last two years have radically changed the way we work — producing winners, losers, and a lot of surprises.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: The last two years have radically changed the way we work — producing winners, losers, and a lot of surprises.
